title: Completely worth it
content: I looked at every website known to mankind and I finally settled on a custom 3D background from Aquadecor. Completely worth it. Every single person that has seen it has thought that it was real wood and rocks that I cut and assembled together.

title: Most realistic aquarium backgrounds ever!
content: The hand-painted details really stand out and make this background a work of art. It has a Styrofoam core, but on the surface it feels just like a rock. Every classic rock aquarium background is entirely customized to the build of your fish tank and matches perfectly the exact dimensions.
